To vaibjav :  it is a new adventure with the tradicional nice gameplay of the game and after Jimmys Vendetta , this is a new nice one , this game is really getting nice dlcs to the users .

Yeah nice DLC's, but it'd be real fuckin nice if the assholes would let us mod the damn game. They're making it seriously difficult, and they also went WAY overboard with the initial DLC runs with all those bullshit vendor specials. If you have a LEGIT copy, you can't even have ALL the DLC's. This could've been one of the greatest games ever made in the history of gaming, but they had to go and ruin it by giving us the middle finger and being all uptight about modders wanting to make the game awesome.

I say fuck DLC's, open up the game, let us mod it, let us fix the fucking problems that need fixing that they refuse to fix, because right now us modders have our hands tied behind out back.
